title: Which is the best EdTech incubator? - Quora

response.answer_text: Attend EdTechReview Summit & Expo to be held on Feb 2’nd and 3’rd 2018 to meet with industry leaders from global arena and stay well informed about the EdTech market operation and its dynamics. If you own an EdTech start-up you could also showcase your products in the expo and increase your networks, pitch to investors and get recognized through awards. Enquire to know more.
Also on the international front… Finland: xEdu — The Education Accelerator “Africa” (based in S Africa, but Pan African): Injini - Africa's EdTech incubator... (more)
